name: 3dInvFMRI
author: AFNI Developers
description: Program to compute stimulus time series, given a 3D+time dataset and an activation map (the inverse of the usual FMRI analysis problem).

inputs.description: Defines activation map; should be a bucket dataset where each sub-brick defines the beta weight map for an unknown stimulus time series.
inputs.name: Activation map

inputs.description: Defines a weighting factor for the map. Dataset can have either 1 sub-brick or the same number as in the -map dataset.
inputs.name: Map weight

inputs.description: Defines a mask dataset to restrict input voxels from -data and -map.
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Baseline time series file. Each column of the file defines a baseline time series.
inputs.name: Baseline file

inputs.description: Adds polynomials of specified order to the baseline collection.
inputs.name: Polynomial order

inputs.description: Determines the method to use: C for least squares fit to data matrix (default) or K for least squares fit to activation matrix.
inputs.name: Method

inputs.description: Set the alpha factor to penalize large values of the output vectors.
inputs.name: Alpha factor

inputs.description: Smooth the results with a 5 point lowpass FIR filter.
inputs.name: 5 point FIR filter

inputs.description: Smooth the results with a 5 point median filter.
inputs.name: 5 point median filter
